name: PickAMovie
0:
”Alexa, Pick me a movie”
”pick me a movie”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pick me a movie
des:
When you can't decide what to watch let Alexa choose a classic.

Picks a random movie for you to watch from the top 25 of each genre.

Romance, Crime, Action, Sci-Fi and Horror

Alexa will tell you some facts on the movie.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
